amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for HUD elderly and disabled housing programs by $15 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding (by offset) for the HUD Elderly and Disabled program by $15 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Harris amendment (A014) Agreed to by recorded vote: 335 - 90 (Roll no. 270).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A014) offered by Ms. Harris.
